articles.content: Investigators believe the gang spent much of the weekend inside the vault without detection, breaking into the boxes and ferrying away their contents. They broke open 3,000 safety deposit boxes, stealing money, gold and jewellery worth an estimated â‚¬30m (Â£26m) and fled without being detected, police said. Officers were alerted while the raid was still under way...
